body:
## Description

Add package for [CLN library](https://www.ginac.de/CLN/). The CLN source code is obtained from the CLN git repository. Some versions are provided in the package definition, each specified by the commit's SHA1 that corresponds to tagged releases.

## Motivation

Some of our applications (and maybe others as well) use this library. Having it available in `spack` eases management of external libraries, as everything can be managed via `spack`.

## How has this been tested?
- `spack install cln` works on my machine.
- `spack flake8` passes on my machine.
title: New package: CLN library for arbitrary precision numerics
